import React from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form"; const Contacto = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const serviceID = "service_wqvaobd"; const templateID = "template_5dnjfyo"; const userID = "user_Y1NXuqBbXSj0BTdA8kb4E"; const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm(serviceID, templateID, e.target, userID) .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } return (
